eu.toolchain.concurrent

Class RetryCallHelper<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • eu.toolchain.concurrent.RetryCallHelper<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - result type of the retried operation
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    Handle<T>

    public class RetryCallHelper<T>
extends Object
implements Handle<T>
    A helper class for retry-until-completed behaviour.

    retry-until-completed is provided by Async.retryUntilCompleted(java.util.concurrent.Callable, RetryPolicy).
